publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-714 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion— That the Parliament agrees that the time for consideration of Stage 3 of the Adults With Incapacity Bill be allotted as follows, so that debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion on the expiry of the specified period (calculated from the time when Stage 3 begins) – Section 1 – up to 1 hour 30 minutes Section 47 – up to 2 hours 30 minutes Section 48 A – up to 3 hours 15 minutes Remainder of the Bill – up to 4 hours Motion to pass the Bill – no later than 4 hours 30 minutes.
